articles.description: Data from the California Department of Public Health also shows 52,636 more confirmed cases were added, bringing up the total to 2,621,277. Health care workers in the state account for 74,589 of total confirmed cases and 281 of total deaths.
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. —California health officials added 695 deaths related to the novel coronavirus Saturday, a record high since the pandemic began. The total death toll is now 29,233 in the state.
